title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, February 4, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of feminist Betty Friedan (1921), who wrote in “The Feminine Mystique” about the cultural myth that women should find total fulfillment as wives and mothers.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of feminist Betty Friedan (1921), who wrote in “The Feminine Mystique” about the cultural myth that women should find total fulfillment as wives and mothers.
